verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Trump administration [V: is] lashing out at China , Iran , Russia and North Korea for being " forces of instability " because of human rights abuses of their own

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: lashing] out [ARG1: at China , Iran , Russia and North Korea] [ARGM-CAU: for being " forces of instability " because of human rights abuses of their own]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Trump administration is lashing out at [ARG1: China , Iran , Russia and North Korea] for [V: being] " [ARG2: forces of instability "] [ARGM-CAU: because of human rights abuses of their own]
